channel.title: Players are unipbanning themselves
channel.description: Players keep unipbanning themselves. How is this happening?

It’s illegal everywhere. You’re, in effect, being malicious to someones computer.

item.title: Players are unipbanning themselves
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Sunarpe, post:10, topic:384691”]no downloads involved…

they go in cmd and type “ipconfig/release” then something i cant remember - and change their ip - you can help it[/quote]
How To Change Your IP In Less Than 1 Minute.

1: Windows Key + R.
2. Type in “command.com” and hit Ok.

You should now be at an command prompt screen.

  1. Type “ipconfig /release” and hit Enter.
  2. Type “exit” and leave the command prompt.
  3. Right-click on “Network Places” or “My Network Places”.
  4. Click on “Properties”.

You should now be on a screen with something titled “Local Area Connection”, or something close to that, and, if you have a network hooked up, all of your other networks.

  1. Right click on “Local Area Connection” and select “Properties”
  2. Double-click on the “Internet Protocol (TCP/IP)” from the list under the “General” tab.
  3. Click on “Use the following IP address” under the “General” tab.
  4. Create an IP address (It doesn’t matter what it is. I just type 1 and 2 until it fills the area up).
  5. Press “Tab” and it should automatically fill in the “Subnet Mask” section with default numbers.
  6. Hit the “Ok” button.
  7. Hit the “Ok” button again.

You should now be back to the “Local Area Connection” screen.

  1. Right-click back on “Local Area Connection” and go to Properties again.
  2. Go back to the “TCP/IP” settings.
  3. This time, select “Obtain an IP address automatically” then click “Ok”.
  4. Click “Ok” again.
  5. You now have a new IP address.

This only changes your dynamic IP address, not your ISP/IP address.

That’s more than likely how they are doing it. So ban the ISP.

Read full topic

item.title: Players are unipbanning themselves
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:11, topic:384691”][quote author=Sunarpe link=topic=480454.msg3517741#msg3517741 date=1299142457]
no downloads involved…

they go in cmd and type “ipconfig/release” then something i cant remember - and change their ip - you can help it
[/quote]
Do you even know what you’re talking about? You can’t change someone else’s IP address over a private server.[/quote]I think he was giving an example of how a player could change their IP address, to get around being IP banned.

Read full topic
